title: Cultural influence of China on Japan Korea Vietnam

content.question: In the period 600 C.E. to 1450 C.E., states in Japan, Korea, and Vietnam had which of the following in common?

choices.label: All were conquered by the Mongols.
All rejected both Buddhism and Christianity.
All were culturally influenced by China.

content.answer: All were culturally influenced by China.

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
